unnormalised: Hey Insta Fam! Ever wonder what's making reels go BOOM these days? Virality trends in social media are changing faster than outfits at a Bollywood awards show.
normalised: Hey Insta Fam! Ever wonder what is making reels go boom these days? Virality trends in social media are changing faster than outfits at a Bollywood awards show. This week, everyone is doing the "Mera Dil Ye Pukare Aaja" remake, a trend kicked off by a Pakistani girl and now sweeping across India like wildfire. Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are even studying the trend, trying to crack the code of instant virality. It is not just catchy tunes, folks! We are seeing a massive rise in hyperlocal content too. Reels showcasing hidden gems in places like Lucknow and Jaipur are getting crazy engagement. Plus, remember the "Kesari" filter from a few years back? Nostalgia is trending, big time! And let us not forget the power of duets! Simple reaction videos are becoming a launchpad for new creators, catapulting them to influencer status overnight. So, what viral trend will you jump on next? Let us know in the comments!
